name: Project: Cow
description:
Project: Cow is a humorous strategy game where the player controls cows inside a spaceship to help them escape from their kidnappers, the Aliens!

Help the Cows

Control 9 different types of cows, using hiding places to advance through the ship's rooms. Each cow has a different speed, so calculate the route and time well.

Escape from the Aliens

Face 5 different types of aliens throughout the levels. Analyze the aliens' route and surveillance times to gain an advantage and go unnoticed.

Cows first!

Advance through the game to discover more about the secret and motivation of the aliens, following the orders of the mysterious cow leader. Never forget, Cows first!



  • 30 stages + 1 stage with final boss.
  • Challenges that depend on strategy and patience.
  • Variety of routes and enemies.
  • Achievements to unlock.
